name: RUN! (itch) (Yilin_ye)
description:
Overview

RUN! is a relaxing and escaping simulator game that you can keep walking to avoid enemy's attack. You can explore this map by no directions, you can walk a way which you discovered. You cannot refill your blood and the goal of the game is to collect points, all you need is passion.

Controls

WASD: To move; SPACE: Jump/Double Jump; Shift: Speed up; V: First/Third person view change; ESC: EXITGAME

Info

DATT3300 Lab1

Student: Yilin Ye
